readable.title: 3530087422_7eb2b2c289
readable.content: A person in a red and white suit kneels down on his skateboard and rides down a road . A person in a red , black and white racing suit and a helmet is riding a skateboard . person skateboarding on street wearing equipment Someone with a black helmet and full body suit is kneeling on a skateboard . The boy in the red and white suit is on a skateboard .
